lexUnit.name: breeches.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: short trousers fastened just below the knee, now chiefly worn for riding or as part of ceremonial dress

sentence.text: ` Put on your breeches and get your master .
A girl in breeches led out a grey horse and said , ` I 'm Fay .
While pottering about her domain she wore old-fashioned riding breeches ending just below the knee , followed by surprisingly pink , surprisingly chubby , bare legs .
It was flag bedecked and in front of it a brass band were parading in breeches , green-Loden jackets and cocked hats .
As a pedestrian , however Shaw was still supremely noticeable as he sailed by in his knee breeches and Norfolk jacket for walks of up to six miles .
Not only was it light , warm and washable , it also made grown men , previously never out of a brown jumper and khaki woollen breeches , dress for the hills in something pink and fluffy .
Would you wear white breeches for general riding ?
Quickly she pulled on the breeches .
He was dressed neatly enough in grey breeches , white shirt and an ill-fitting blue coat , but was barefoot .
She was still wearing muddy breeches , black socks and Merlin s polo shirt .
Leprechauns usually wear a cocked hat , breeches , and shoes with large buckles .
In the early days he wore the traditional blue breeches and red jacket , the latter being embroidered with the gibbet and a ladder in black .
A pair of buckskin breeches was provided for him , as well as a coat and waistcoat of cloth and a plain round hat , with a fustian close jacket for morning work .
Short and square , with greasy black hair and a Van Dyke beard , he wore a sea-green smoking-jacket over a frilled shirt and wine-coloured velvet breeches .
An old man in corduroy breeches and cloth jacket came round the side of the house and touched his cap .
He wore a black uniform , black breeches , and a flared jacket .
Wearing a rather absurd black tasselled fez , an army officer 's uniform jacket , riding breeches and a black shirt , he delivered his speech slowly , articulating the words very clearly .
The door was flung open and two burly men in boots , sturdy breeches , coarse shirts and bicorne hats marched in .
He was wearing jacket and breeches and a cap .
He stripped off his scaly shirt and breeches and ran his hand over his armpits and groin .
